typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRRatingFromRAW
SRRatingFromRAW select(mapColumn(
		MovieRatingDescription = rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RatingFieldSelect
